summary: Completed testing of Cloud Watcher Phase 2 authentication and core functionality. Backend APIs remain fully functional (21/21 tests passed). Frontend shows significant improvement with successful login, navigation, and data display. However, unable to complete full Select component testing due to browser automation issues.

ui_bugs.issue: Dismiss buttons not found on recommendations page

integration_issues.issue: Unable to complete testing due to browser automation crashes
integration_issues.note: Previous Select component issues may still exist but couldn't be verified

passed_tests: Dashboard loads with proper stats (13 instances, 2 accounts, 7 FinOps alerts, 8 SecOps alerts)
Navigation between all pages (Dashboard, Accounts, Inventory, Recommendations, Settings)
Settings page admin access (Users and Audit Log tabs)
Accounts page displays existing cloud accounts with status
Inventory page shows 14 instances across 2 accounts with detailed information
Recommendations page shows 16 recommendations with proper categorization

success_percentage.frontend: 85% (core functionality works, some components untested due to browser issues)

action_item_for_main_agent: 1. Add dismiss buttons with proper data-testid attributes to recommendation items for testing. 2. Verify Select component fixes from iteration 1 are working properly in Add Account modal. 3. Consider adding more robust error handling for form interactions.
